item.title: 英特尔被解雇的犹太裔员工起诉前主管涉嫌反犹太主义
item.description: 英特尔公司的一名犹太裔前雇员周二起诉了这家芯片制造商，称他因抱怨自己的上司公开赞美反犹太主义、哈马斯和针对以色列的恐怖主义而被解雇。【原文：A Jewish former employee of Intel sued the chipmaker on Tuesday, saying he was fired after complaining that the senior executive he reported to openly celebrated antisemitism, Hamas and terrorism against Israel.】

item.title: 谷歌 Fitbit 和 Peloton 宣布建立健身内容合作关系
item.description: 谷歌公司和 Peloton Interactive 公司周二表示，Fitbit 已与 Peloton Interactive 合作，从 9 月初开始，Fitbit 的高级用户可以访问这家健身器材制造商的健身内容。【原文：Google's Fitbit has partnered with Peloton Interactive to give its premium users access to the exercise equipment maker's fitness content, starting early September, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美联储博斯蒂克称还需 "更多数据 "才能准备好降息
item.description: 亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周二表示，最近的经济数据让他 "更有信心 "美国央行能让通胀率回到2%的目标，但他希望在准备支持降息之前看到 "更多一点的数据"。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic on Tuesday said recent economic data has made him "more confident" the U.S. central bank can get inflation back to the 2% target, but he wants to see "a little more data" before he's ready to support lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 研究显示，德国和意大利进口了法律上可疑的巴西黄金
item.description: 一家智库周二表示，德国进口的所有巴西黄金和意大利进口的71%巴西黄金都来自亚马逊地区，那里的非法采矿活动十分猖獗，该智库呼吁欧洲加强监督。【原文：All Brazilian gold imports by Germany and 71% by Italy come from areas of the Amazon where illegal mining is rampant, a think thank said on Tuesday, calling for increased European scrutiny.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 CBA 面临市场主导地位考验，年度盈利下降迫在眉睫
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）是澳大利亚最大的贷款机构，预计将于周三公布年度盈利的小幅下降，投资者关注的焦点是存款支付和不良贷款的增加是否会超过抵押贷款收入的增长。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia , the country's biggest lender, is expected to unveil a small decline in annual earnings on Wednesday, with investors focused on whether rising deposit payouts and bad loans will outweigh gains in mortgage revenue.】

item.title: 永明美国牙科业务出现季度亏损，但有望在 2025 年盈利 1 亿美元
item.description: Sun Life Financial Inc 首席执行官凯文-斯特恩（Kevin Strain）周二表示，该公司的美国牙科保险业务在最近一个季度出现亏损后正在好转，有望在 2025 年实现该业务盈利 1 亿美元的目标。【原文：Sun Life Financial Inc CEO Kevin Strain said on Tuesday the company's U.S. dental insurance business was improving after losing money in the latest quarter, and was on track to hit its goal for $100 million in earnings in that segment in 2025.】

item.title: 法国麦当劳在篮球赛输给美国队后开玩笑说要取消咖喱酱
item.description: 法国麦当劳说，它正考虑在下届奥运会之前从菜单上撤下咖喱酱，以示对美国篮球队队长斯蒂芬-库里（Stephen Curry）的抗议。【原文：McDonald's France said it is considering taking curry sauce off its menus until the next Olympics in a joke protest over U.S. basketball team captain Stephen Curry, whose last-gasp heroics denied France gold at the Paris Games.】

item.title: 谷歌推出人工智能驱动的新手机和其他小工具
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周二发布了一系列新款 Pixel 智能手机，这些手机更深入地集成了谷歌的人工智能技术，谷歌正努力将人工智能融入其硬件中。【原文：Alphabet’s Google on Tuesday unveiled a lineup of new Pixel smartphones with deeper integrations of itsartificial intelligence technology as it races to incorporate AI into its hardware.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司和通用动力公司宣布达成制造火箭发动机的协议
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）和通用动力公司（General Dynamics）周二宣布了一项制造固体火箭发动机的协议，因为固体火箭发动机持续短缺，导致导弹生产受限。【原文：Lockheed Martin and General Dynamics on Tuesday announced an agreement to build solid rocket motors amid an ongoing shortage that has capped production of missiles.】

item.title: 星巴克聘请 Chipotle 的尼科尔担任第六任首席执行官
item.description: 星巴克周二任命 Chipotle Mexican Grill 的布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）为新任首席执行官，接替执掌星巴克近一年半的拉克斯曼-纳拉西姆汉（Laxman Narasimhan），这是星巴克全球咖啡连锁店最高领导层任职时间最短的一位。【原文：Starbucks on Tuesday named Chipotle Mexican Grill's Brian Niccol as its new CEO, replacing Laxman Narasimhan, who was at the helm for close to a year and a half, the shortest span for a top boss at the global coffee chain.】

item.title: 星巴克新任最高领导布莱恩-尼科尔是谁？
item.description: 在激进投资者的压力以及美国和中国市场销售额下滑的情况下，星巴克周二任命Chipotle Mexican Grill的负责人布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）领导这家以价格昂贵的拿铁咖啡而闻名的咖啡巨头。【原文：Starbucks tapped Chipotle Mexican Grill's head Brian Niccol on Tuesday to lead the coffee giant known for its pricey lattes amid pressure from activist investors and declining sales in the U.S. and China.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 正在权衡以 26 亿美元出售活动集团 Clarion
item.description: 三位熟悉此事的人士告诉路透社，Blackstone 集团正在探索 Clarion Events 的各种选择，包括出售，该公司的估值可能高达 20 亿英镑（26 亿美元），因为大流行过后，人们对活动组织者的胃口继续恢复。【原文：Blackstone Group is exploring options for Clarion Events, including a sale, that could value the business at up to 2 billion pounds ($2.6 billion), three people familiar with the matter told Reuters, as appetite for event organisers continues to recover after the pandemic.】

item.title: 嘉士伯上调 2024 年有机增长展望，第二季度销售额低于预期
item.description: 丹麦啤酒酿造商嘉士伯周二上调了全年有机增长预期，尽管第二季度销售额低于预期。【原文：Danish brewer Carlsberg on Tuesday lifted its full-year organic growth outlook despite posting weaker-than-expected sales for the second quarter.】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司开始裁员计划，在美国裁员 15
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）在一份内部备忘录中表示，作为裁员计划的一部分，该媒体巨头将从周二开始在美国裁员 15%。【原文：Paramount Global will begin laying off 15% of its workforce in the United States starting Tuesday as part of its planned job cuts, the media giant said in an internal memo.】

item.title: 波音公司 7 月交付 43 架喷气式飞机，同比持平
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，该公司 7 月份交付了 43 架商用喷气式飞机，与去年同期持平，当时该公司面临着供应链方面的障碍，这家美国飞机制造商正在新任首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）的领导下努力提高飞机产量。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it delivered 43 commercial jets in July, unchanged from the same month a year earlier when it faced supply chain hurdles, as the U.S. planemaker works to grow aicraft production under new CEO Kelly Ortberg.】

item.title: 消息人士称，华平投资支持的网络安全公司 eSentire 正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，eSentire 公司的所有者正在探索各种方案，包括可能出售这家网络安全公司，包括债务在内，该公司的估值可能在 10 亿美元左右。【原文：The owners of eSentire are exploring options including a potential sale that could value the cybersecurity company at about $1 billion, including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Canalys 称，人工智能个人电脑占个人电脑季度出货量的 14
item.description: 研究公司 Canalys 周二表示，人工智能个人电脑占第二季度个人电脑总出货量的 14%，其中苹果遥遥领先，因为新增的人工智能功能有助于重振需求。【原文：AI PCs accounted for 14% of all personal computers shipped in the second quarter with Apple leading the way, research firm Canalys said on Tuesday, as added artificial intelligence capabilities help reinvigorate demand.】

item.title: UAW 对特朗普和马斯克提出劳工指控
item.description: 美国汽车工人工会周二表示，已对唐纳德-特朗普和特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克试图威胁和恐吓工人的行为提出联邦劳工指控。【原文：The United Auto Workers Union said on Tuesday it has filed federal labor charges against Donald Trump and Tesla CEO Elon Musk over attempts to threaten and intimidate workers.】

item.title: 版权组织删除荷兰语人工智能数据集
item.description: 荷兰版权执法组织 BREIN 周二表示，该组织已经删除了一个用于训练人工智能模型的大型语言数据集。【原文：Dutch-based copyright enforcement group BREIN has taken down a large language dataset that was being offered for use in training AI models, the organization said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 随着竞争加剧，DoorDash 将为美国会员提供 Max 流媒体服务
item.description: DoorDash 周二表示，它已与华纳兄弟发现公司旗下的 Max 合作，向美国的会员计划用户免费提供流媒体服务。【原文：DoorDash on Tuesday said it had partnered with Warner Bros Discovery's Max to provide the streaming service at no extra cost to its membership program subscribers in the United States.】

item.title: 美国 7 月生产者价格涨幅低于预期
item.description: 美国 7 月份生产者价格的增幅低于预期，因为商品成本的上涨受到了服务价格下降的抑制，这表明通胀继续趋缓。【原文：U.S. producer prices increased less than expected in July as a rise in the cost of goods was tempered by cheaper services, indicating that inflation continued to moderate.】

item.title: 福特因高田气囊问题持续存在而发布 "请勿驾驶 "警告
item.description: 福特汽车周二针对仍受高田安全气囊召回影响的部分车辆发布了 "请勿驾驶 "公告。【原文：Ford Motor issued an do-not-drive advisory on Tuesday for certain vehicles still affected by Takata airbag recalls.】

item.title: 星巴克首席执行官拉克斯曼-纳拉西汉卸任，Chipotle 的布莱恩-尼科尔接任
item.description: 星巴克周二表示，Chipotle Mexican Grill 的负责人布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）将接替董事长兼首席执行官拉克斯曼-纳拉西姆汉（Laxman Narasimhan）。【原文：Starbucks said on Tuesday that Chipotle Mexican Grill's head, Brian Niccol, will replace Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Laxman Narasimhan.】

item.title: 市场动荡不安，波动性基金吸引投资者
item.description: 由于市场对经济前景的担忧与日俱增、货币政策的不确定性以及科技行业泡沫般的估值，全球管理型波动率基金上个月出现了一年多来的首次净流入。【原文：Global managed volatility funds saw their first net inflows for more than a year last month, as markets reacted to growing concerns over the economic outlook, uncertainty around monetary policy, and bubble-like valuations in the technology sector.】

item.title: Natura 第二季度核心盈利好于预期，原料药影响底线
item.description: 巴西化妆品制造商 Natura &Co 周一晚些时候公布的第二季度核心盈利好于预期，但由于美国子公司雅芳产品（Avon Products）申请破产保护，其底线受到了核销的影响。【原文：Brazilian cosmetic maker Natura &Co late on Monday posted better-than-expected core earnings for the second quarter, but saw its bottom line affected by write-offs as U.S. subsidiary Avon Products filed for bankruptcy protection.】

item.title: 比特币矿商 Bitfarms 主席邦塔将卸任
item.description: 比特币矿商比特大陆（Bitfarms）周二表示，其联合创始人兼董事长尼古拉斯-邦塔（Nicolas Bonta）将退出董事会，立即生效。【原文：Bitcoin miner Bitfarms said on Tuesday its co-founder and chair, Nicolas Bonta, will step down from the board, effective immediately.】

item.title: 三星电子韩国主要工会周四起因薪酬问题举行罢工
item.description: 韩国三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics）最大的工人工会周二表示，该工会将从周四开始举行为期四天的罢工，在 7 月份与管理层的谈判失败后，就提高工资和奖金问题向公司施压。【原文：Samsung Electronics' biggest workers' union in South Korea said on Tuesday it would begin a four-day strike from Thursday to pressure the company over higher wages and bonuses after talks with management fell through in July.】

item.title: 凯雷将以 38 亿美元收购百特的肾脏保健分拆公司 Vantive
item.description: 收购公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）周二表示，已达成一项协议，将以 38 亿美元的价格收购医疗器械制造商百特公司（Baxter）的肾脏护理部门 Vantive。【原文：Buyout firm Carlyle Group struck a deal to acquire medical-device maker Baxter’s kidney-care unit Vantive for $3.8 billion, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：华为准备新人工智能芯片，在中国挑战英伟达
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引消息人士的话报道，中国华为技术公司即将推出一款用于人工智能的新芯片，以在美国制裁下在中国挑战英伟达。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies is close to introducing a new chip for artificial intelligence use to challenge Nvidia in China amid U.S. sanctions, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing sources.】

item.title: 通用汽车因制动问题召回逾 2.1 万辆美国电动 SUV
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，由于担心防抱死制动系统会意外启动，通用汽车公司（General Motors）将在美国召回 21,469 辆电动 SUV。【原文：General Motors is recalling 21,469 electric SUVs in the U.S. over concerns of an unexpected activation of the anti-lock brake system, and will remedy the issue through an over-the-air update, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】
